paper_abstract: We study the issues of reconstruction of the inverse nodal problem for the one-dimensional p-Laplacian eigenvalue problem with eigenparameter boundary value conditions. A key step is the application of a modified Prufer substitution to derive a detailed asymptotic expansion for the eigenvalues and nodal lengths. The parameter boundary data are also reconstructed. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Inverse nodal problems for the p-Laplacian with eigenparameter dependent boundary conditions
